item.title: Protecting Your Privacy Online: Safe Social Media Practices
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "privacy" , "online privacy" , "social media" , "safe practices" , "privacy settings" , "LinkedIn" , "Facebook" , "Twitter" , "Instagram" , "friend requests" , "random links" , "surveys" , "government regulations" , "GDPR" , "CCPA" , "cybersecurity" , "data protection" , "personal data" , "privacy breach" , "digital security" , "privacy risks" , "privacy laws" , "privacy regulations" , "data privacy" , "online security" , "privacy protection" , "social media privacy" , "privacy tips" , "online privacy practices" , "protecting personal information"
item.description: Discover essential tips for safe social media practices to protect your privacy online and learn about the privacy settings of popular platforms like LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.
